document_data.name: Gauhok
document_data.mainbody: '''Gauhok''' was a [[dwarf]] [[fighter]] who lived in [[Mirabar]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The dwarf had a thick black beard. He was the son of [[Steelfist]], the dwarven representative of the [[Council of Sparkling Stones]]. He was exceptional at many things, especially combat; he was remarkably strong and talented.
document_data.Possessions: Gauhok fought with full [[plate mail]], a [[helmet]], and a [[battleaxe]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1358 DR]], Steelfist offered his son, Gauhok, the opportunity to adventure with the famed [[Heroes of Ascore]], at the heroes' discretion.
